TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StripLine extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement

summary.span: 表示图表上的带状线。

span.span: Represents the strip lines on a chart.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 条带线 (或条带) 是水平或垂直的范围, 用常规或自定义间隔对图表的背景进行着色。Strip lines, or strips, are horizontal or vertical ranges that shade the background of a chart in regular or custom intervals. 您可以使用条带线执行以下操作:You can use strip lines to: - 提高在图表上查找各个值时的可读性。Improve readability for looking up individual values on the chart. - 读取图表时单独的数据点。Separate data points when reading the chart. - 突出显示定期出现的日期, 例如, 用于标识周末数据点。Highlight dates that occur at regular intervals, for example, to identify weekend data points. - 突出显示特定键范围内的数据。Highlight a specific key range of data. - 在特定常量值处添加阈值行。Add a threshold line at a specific constant value. 对于给定的时间间隔, 可以一次或多次绘制单个对象。A single object can either be drawn once, or repeatedly, for a given interval. 此操作由属性控制。This action is controlled by the property. 如果将零值分配给该属性, 则将绘制一个条带线。When a value of zero is assigned to the property, one strip line will be drawn. 如果为属性分配非零值, 则会在每个给定的时间间隔重复绘制条带线。When a non-zero value is assigned to the property, a strip line will be drawn repeatedly at each given interval. 条带线的绘制位置也受条带线的和属性的影响。The location where a strip line is drawn is also affected by the and properties of the strip line. 条带线始终与对象相关联。Strip lines are always associated with an object. 可以在设计时和运行时添加它们。They can be added at both design time and run time. 若要添加水平或垂直线条以显示阈值, 请将属性设置为值0.0。To add a horizontal or vertical line to display a threshold, set the property to a value of 0.0. 这将导致绘制线条。This will result in a line being drawn. 对于线条的颜色、 宽度和样式, 可以使用、和属性。You can use the , and properties for the color, width and style of the line. 当属性设置为 0.0`Back*`时, 不使用任何图表背景属性 ()。 No chart background properties (`Back*`) are used when the property is set to 0.0. 使用条带线的属性将文本与条带线关联。Use the property of the strip line to associate text with a strip line. 此文本的位置和方向可以通过属性进行控制。The placement and orientation of this text can be controlled by the property. 为同一轴定义多条带线时, 条带线可能会重叠。When multiple strip lines are defined for the same axis, it is possible that the strip lines will overlap. 对象的 Z 顺序由其在对象中的出现顺序确定。The Z-order of objects is determined by their order of occurrence in the object. 这意味着首先绘制第一个匹配项;第二次出现第二个, 依此类推。This means that the first occurrence is drawn first; the second occurrence is drawn second, and so on. 以下图表类型不支持条带线:饼图、圆环图、漏斗图、棱锥图、卡吉、ThreeLineBreak、点数、极坐标和雷达图。Strip lines are not supported for the following chart types: Pie, Doughnut, Funnel, Pyramid, Kagi, ThreeLineBreak, PointAndFigure, Polar and Radar.

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the strip line.

value.span: 一个 结构。

span.span: A structure.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 若要设置条带线的渐变, 请设置和属性。To set a gradient for the strip line, set the and properties. 如果将此颜色设置为 "透明", 则将该颜色设置为 0-不会将颜色分配给该元素的背景。If you set this color to "transparent" - in other words, set the alpha value to 0 - no color will be assigned to the background of the element. 因此, 背景将是透明的。As a result, the background will be transparent. 如果该属性设置为 0.0, 则将绘制一条线, 并且该属性将确定线条的颜色, 而不是此属性。If the property is set to 0.0, a line will be drawn and the property will determine the color of the line, not this property.

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的渐变样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the gradient style of the strip line.

value.span: 枚举。

span.span: A enumeration.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定图表元素是否将显示渐变以及渐变的方向 (如果使用)。The property determines whether a chart element will display a gradient, as well as the orientation of the gradient, if used. 使用渐变颜色:To use gradient colors: - 使用属性设置主色。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用属性设置辅助颜色。Use the property to set the secondary color. - 将 chart 元素的此属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set this property of the chart element to the desired gradient style. 如果将属性设置为值 0.0, 则此属性不适用。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style of the strip line.

value.span: 枚举。

span.span: A enumeration.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 阴影模式包含纯色背景色和在背景上绘制的线条。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 阴影样式中使用的两种颜色由和属性设置。The two colors used in the hatch style are set by the and properties. 如果将属性设置为值 0.0, 则此属性不适用。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的背景图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image of the strip line.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图像文件的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents an image file's URL.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为多个图表元素定义背景图像的路径, 是绝对或相对 URL。The property defines a path to a background image for many chart elements, and is an absolute or relative URL. 若要定位此图像, 请使用和属性。To position this image, use the and properties. 你还可以通过设置属性, 将图像显示的一种颜色指定为 "透明"。You can also specify that one color will be displayed by the image as "transparent" by setting the property. 图像可以是 .NET Framework 支持的任何有效图形文件, 包括图标。An image can be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 如果将属性设置为值 0.0, 则此属性不适用。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0. 背景图像优先于其他背景属性, 如渐变颜色。Background images take precedence over other background properties, such as gradient colors.

span.span: Gets or sets the background image alignment.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: A enumeration value.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定条带线的背景图像的对齐方式;仅当属性设置为时才应用此设置。This property determines the alignment of the background image for strip lines; it is only applied when the property is set to . 有关可用对齐方式的详细信息, 请参阅枚举主题。For more information about available alignments, see the enumeration topic.

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing mode of the background image of the strip line.

value.span: 一个 整数枚举。

span.span: A integer enumeration.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定图像的显示方式;即平铺、缩放等。This property determines how the image is displayed; that is, tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果缩放图像, 则会拉伸该图像以适合边界条带线。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounding strip line. 如果图像已平铺, 则从左上角开始重复绘制。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner. 有关可用包装模式的详细信息, 请参阅枚举主题。For more information concerning the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果将属性设置为, 则绘制图像的位置将由属性设置确定。 If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn will be determined by the property setting. 如果的值设置为 0.0, 则此属性不适用。This property is not applicable if is set to a value of 0.0.

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of the strip line background.

value.span: 一个 值，该值用于带阴影或渐变填充的背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of a background with hatching or gradient fill.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定多个图表对象的辅助背景色, 并在应用渐变颜色时使用。This property determines the secondary background color of many chart objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied. 可以将背景辅助颜色设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。You can set background secondary color to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用影线, 则属性将确定阴影线的颜色。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines. 若要对图表元素的背景使用渐变颜色:To use gradient colors for the background of a chart element: - 使用属性设置主色。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用此属性设置辅助颜色。Use this property to set the secondary color. - 将属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set the property to the desired gradient style. 如果将属性设置为值 0.0, 则此属性不适用。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果对象的属性设置为 0.0, 则将绘制一条线条, 它是此属性, 而不是将确定线条颜色的属性设置。If the property of a object is set to 0.0, a line will be drawn, and it is this property and not the property setting that will determine the color of the line.

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的间隔，并确定带状线是绘制一次还是重复绘制。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval for a strip line, and determines if the strip line is drawn once or repeatedly.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示带状线之间的间隔。

span.span: A value that represents the interval between strip lines.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default value is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将属性的值设置为零, 则将显示一条条带线, 并使用属性指定宽度。When you set the property to a value of zero, one strip line will be displayed, with a width specified by the property. 如果将设置为非零值, 则将显示多条带线。When you set to a value of other than zero, multiple strip lines will be shown. 用于属性的单位由属性定义。The unit that is used for the property is defined by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 间隔类型可以设置为, 在这种情况下, 类型依赖于: 绘制对象的 X 值或 Y 值类型, 具体取决于对象所属的轴和轴刻度。Interval types can be set to , in which case the type depends on: the X-value or Y-value types of the plotted objects - depending on which axis the objects belong to - and the axis scale. 属性确定条带或线条的绘制频率。The property determines how often a strip or line is drawn.

span.span: A value that determines whether a strip or a line is drawn.

value.span: 默认值为 0.0。

span.span: The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不能设置为小于零的值, 否则将引发异常。This property cannot be set to a value less than zero, otherwise an exception will be raised. 设置为0.0 将导致绘制一行;此行将使用的、 和属性设置的颜色、宽度和样式。A setting of 0.0 will result in a line being drawn; this line will use the , and property settings for its color, width and style. 当的`Back*` 值为0.0 时, 不使用此类中的任何属性。None of the `Back*` properties in this class are utilized when the value of is 0.0. 如果将属性设置为大于零的值, 则将创建一个条带。If you set the property to a value greater than zero, a strip will be created. 、和属性仅适用于条纹的`Back*`边框; 然后, 所有属性都用于条带的背景属性。 The , and properties only apply to the border of the strip; all of the `Back*` properties are then used for the background properties of the strip. 如果属性的值大于 0.0, 则单位取决于相关轴刻度。If the value of the property is greater than 0.0, the units are determined by the relevant axis scale.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定用于属性的单位。This property determines the units used for the property. 例如, 若要设置条带线以表示 "一周", 则可以将此属性设置为, 并将属性设置为 1 (1.0)。For example, to set a strip line to represent "one week", you could set this property to and set the property to one (1.0). 当 相关轴刻度使用值时,可以将此属性的值从更改为值。You can change the value of this property from to a value when the relevant axis scale uses a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为值, 则将基于图表类型对文本进行定向。When this property is set to a value of , the text is oriented based on the chart type. 对于条形图之外的所有 X-y 图表类型, X 轴条带线文本在条带线的底部从左至右方向上沿水平方向。For all X-Y chart types other than Bar, X-axis strip line text is oriented horizontally from left to right on the bottom of the strip line. 对于条形图, X 轴条带线文本在条带线的顶部向下垂直方向。For Bar charts, X-axis strip line text is oriented vertically from top to bottom to the right of the strip line.
